mapper.select:
SELECT EPE.ELEMENT_ID as posCateId, EPE.ELEMENT_NAME as posCateName, EPE.ELEMENT_TYPE as type, EPES.ELEMENT_ID_PARENT as parentId, EPE.ELEMENT_CODE AS code, (SELECT E.ELEMENT_NAME FROM EHRCUC_POS_ELEMENT E WHERE E.ELEMENT_ID = EPES.ELEMENT_ID_PARENT) AS parentName, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EHRCUC_POS_ELEMENT_STRUCTURE S WHERE S.ELEMENT_ID_PARENT = EPE.ELEMENT_ID AND S.VERSION_ID = #{versionId} AND S.ATTRIBUTE1 IS NULL) AS posSubcateCount, EPE.ELEMENT_CODE AS elementCode, EPE.ATTRIBUTE2 AS attribute2, EPE.ATTRIBUTE3 AS attribute3, EPE.ATTRIBUTE4 AS attribute4, EPE.ATTRIBUTE5 AS attribute5, EPE.ATTRIBUTE6 AS attribute6, EPE.ATTRIBUTE7 AS attribute7, EPE.ATTRIBUTE8 AS attribute8, EPE.ATTRIBUTE9 AS attribute9, EPE.ATTRIBUTE10 AS attribute11 FROM EHRCUC_POS_ELEMENT EPE, EHRCUC_POS_ELEMENT_STRUCTURE EPES
WHERE 1 = 1 AND EPE.ELEMENT_TYPE = #{elementType} AND EPE.ELEMENT_ID = EPES.ELEMENT_ID_CHILD AND EPES.VERSION_ID = #{versionId} AND EPES.ATTRIBUTE1 IS NULL
and EPES.ELEMENT_ID_PARENT = #{posCateId}
ORDER BY EPE.ELEMENT_CODE

SELECT epe.element_name SEQ, epe2.element_name CSEQ, epe3.element_name MAJOR, epe4.element_name KEYRESP, epe4.attribute2 ETU, epe4.attribute3 WORKEXP, epe4.attribute4 ISCORE, epe4.attribute5 JZRANK, epe4.attribute6 JTRANK, epe4.attribute7 SFRANK, epe4.attribute8 DSRANK, epe4.attribute9 QXRANK, epe4.attribute4 ISCORE, epe5.element_name CKEYRESP, replace(replace(replace(replace(epe5.attribute1,'J','集团' ),'S','省'),'D','市'),'X','县') LEVELTYPE FROM ehrcuc_pos_element epe , ehrcuc_pos_element_structure pes , ehrcuc_pos_element epe2 , ehrcuc_pos_element_structure pes2 , ehrcuc_pos_element epe3 , ehrcuc_pos_element_structure pes3 , ehrcuc_pos_element epe4 , ehrcuc_pos_element_structure pes4 , ehrcuc_pos_element epe5 WHERE epe.element_type = '10' and epe.element_id = pes.element_id_parent and epe2.element_type = '20' and epe2.element_id = pes.element_id_child and pes2.element_id_parent = epe2.element_id and epe3.element_type = '30' and pes2.element_id_child = epe3.element_id and pes3.element_id_parent = epe3.element_id
and (epe3.element_id in (${sequence}) or epe.element_id in (${sequence}) or epe2.element_id in (${sequence}) )
and epe4.element_name like concat("%", #{respName}, "%")
and epe5.attribute1 like concat("%", #{levelType}, "%")
and epe5.element_name like concat("%", #{cRespName}, "%")
and DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') between IFNULL(epe.date_from,date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 1 DAY )) and IFNULL(epe.date_to,DATE_ADD( sysdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and DATE_FORMAT(ifnull(epe.date_to,DATE_ADD( sysdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))) between DATE_FORMAT('1970/01/01','%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and epe4.element_type = '40' and pes3.element_id_child = epe4.element_id and epe4.element_id = pes4.element_id_parent and epe5.element_type = '50' and epe5.element_id = pes4.element_id_child order by epe.element_id

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ehrcuc_pos_element epe , ehrcuc_pos_element_structure pes , ehrcuc_pos_element epe2 , ehrcuc_pos_element_structure pes2 , ehrcuc_pos_element epe3 , ehrcuc_pos_element_structure pes3 , ehrcuc_pos_element epe4 , ehrcuc_pos_element_structure pes4 , ehrcuc_pos_element epe5 WHERE epe.element_type = '10' and epe.element_id = pes.element_id_parent and epe2.element_type = '20' and epe2.element_id = pes.element_id_child and pes2.element_id_parent = epe2.element_id and epe3.element_type = '30' and pes2.element_id_child = epe3.element_id and pes3.element_id_parent = epe3.element_id
and (epe3.element_id in (${sequence}) or epe.element_id in (${sequence}) or epe2.element_id in (${sequence}) )
and epe4.element_name like concat("%", #{respName}, "%")
and epe5.attribute1 like concat("%", #{levelType}, "%")
and epe5.element_name like concat("%", #{cRespName}, "%")
and DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') between IFNULL(epe.date_from,date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 1 DAY )) and IFNULL(epe.date_to,DATE_ADD( sysdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))
and DATE_FORMAT(ifnull(epe.date_to,DATE_ADD( sysdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ))) between DATE_FORMAT('1970/01/01','%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and epe4.element_type = '40' and pes3.element_id_child = epe4.element_id and epe4.element_id = pes4.element_id_parent and epe5.element_type = '50' and epe5.element_id = pes4.element_id_child order by epe.element_id

SELECT EPE.ELEMENT_ID , EPE.ELEMENT_NAME FROM EHRCUC_POS_ELEMENT EPE WHERE 1 = 1 AND EPE.ELEMENT_TYPE = '10' AND date_format ( now( ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) BETWEEN ifnull ( epe.Date_From, date_sub( date_format( now( ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) , INTERVAL 1 DAY ) ) AND ifnull ( epe.Date_To, DATE_ADD( now( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) )
SELECT ELEMENT_ID FROM EHRCUC_POS_ELEMENT WHERE ELEMENT_NAME LIKE concat("%", #{elementName}, "%")

SELECT element_id as elementId, element_name as elementName FROM ehrcuc_pos_element WHERE 1 = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') between IFNULL(date_from,date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 1 DAY )) and IFNULL(date_to,DATE_ADD( sysdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY )) and element_type = 10 order by element_id
